assumeStyleTagobject

output.t[1060]

Summary

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

<.assume> - style for “assumption” messages, showing an assumption the parser is making. This style is used for showing objects used by default when not specified in a command, objects that the parser chose despite some ambiguity, and implied commands.

assumeStyleTag :   StyleTag
